section.p: You open a folder to see which documents it contains. You can then select a document to work with from the Document List window.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
The folder from the Folder List window
Open from the File menu
Alternatively, double-click the folder to open it.
The Document List window is displayed.

section.title: Results
section.p: A list of documents in the selected folder is displayed. From this list, you can start document-related functions by selecting one or more documents and an action from one of the menus.
